product_name: The North Face Exertion Triclimate 3-in-1 Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face 3-in-1 Exertion Triclimate jacket for men delivers protection against variable weather with a waterproof, windproof breathable HyVent(R) shell and removable 200g fleece liner. Shell is fully seam sealed for weather protection. Pit zips let you vent excess heat instantly. Hood is fully adjustable and removable. Shell offers zippered hand pockets, a zippered chest pocket and an internal media pocket. Fleece liner jacket has zippered hand pockets. Exertion Triclimate jacket for men is zip-in compatible with complementing garments from The North Face.
short_description: The North Face 3-in-1 Exertion Triclimate jacket for men delivers protection against variable weather with a waterproof, windproof breathable HyVent(R) shell and removable 200g fleece liner.
